description:
This mod allows you to play Survival mode with mods, while also being able to craft the modded parts in the craftbot!

[h1]How to make your mod compatible with this custom game[/h1]
[b]Step 1[/b]: Add a folder named "CraftingRecipes" into your root mod folder
[b]Step 2[/b]: Add a file named "craftbot.json", "hideout.json" or "workbench.json" into the "CraftingRecipes" folder
[b]Step 3[/b]: Add your own crafting recipes into "craftbot.json" file
[b]Step 4[/b]: Enjoy!

You can find a more detailed guide on the [b][url=https://github.com/QuestionableM/Modded-Craftbot-Recipes/blob/main/README.md]github[/url][/b] page of this custom game.

[h1]Important[/h1]
If you're a modder and want to actually test the crafting recipes in your mod, it has to exist in the mod database. The mod database updates every 12 hours. Feel free to ask [b]TechnologicNick#4045[/b] to run the update task manually.

You can also ask more questions in our [b][url=https://discord.gg/SVEFyus]Discord[/url][/b] server.

[h1]Other info[/h1]
[code]
[h1][b]Compatible mods[/b][/h1]
[list]
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2813939549]Funky Guns Pack [FGP][/url][/b]
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2448492759]The Modpack Continuation[/url][/b]
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=905650948]MJM Mod[/url][/b]
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1390938191]Wings Mod[/url][/b]
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2608079677]Lucky Block Mod[/url][/b]
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2481146118]Leaked Blocks and Parts[/url][/b]
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2824149581]Raft Mechanic: Tools & Parts For Creative[/url][/b]
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2813593777]Fireaxe[/url][/b]
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2826205992]Sticky Wheels[/url][/b]
[/list]

More coming in the future!
[/code]

Preview was made by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198318189561]Dart Frog[/url]
name: Modded Craftbot Recipes
